encounter.name: Imperial Chancery Roll and Cartulary
encounter.precis: Prove that Melchior Fulcade's copy of the will is a forgery.
encounter.progression: The document that registers the new seal with the courts.

details.p: Imperial Chancery Roll and Cartulary: a collection of transcribed copies of charters in book form. Keeps copies of title deeds, charters, writs, letters patent etc.
Fulcades hirelings will be sent to burn down the local records office. Old fat drunk guard. Someone's trying to burn down the records?
